job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtOur missionltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtSleegals mission is to make legal services accessible to everyone At Sleegal we are using machine learning to build a legal marketplace that accurately matches clients with lawyers Today users have to go online to search for lawyers on their own giving calls to multiple lawyers hoping to find the right one with the right price With our tech users find the lawyers that truly match their needs with just a few lines of online chat and completely for freeampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtYou will work closely with our founding team to develop our web products You will play a critical role in improving the user experience for clients and lawyers We will expect you to not only solve problems but propose new ideas that may fundamentally change our productltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWe are a dynamic team with a mixed background in law tech and business Our core team members earned degrees from top US law schools and business schools and have deep experience building successful AI products in the Valley ranging from autonomous vehicles to wearable devicesampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThis position can start GatsbyltligtltligtExperience with AWS ie Lambda DynamoDB SQS etcltligtltligtEntrepreneurial a selfstarter motivated to bring a product from 0 to 1ltligtltligtFrontend design experience or AI with equity of a seedstage companyltligtltligtThis is a 40hourweek contractor position with the opportunity to convert to fulltimeltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtOur team
